it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model

Class Strengths

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.Strengths
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Strengths
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds values for strengths that affect the player while performing an action.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Strengths

        public Strengths()
        Default constructor, all values are put to 0.

      • Strengths

        public Strengths(int harvest,
                 int production,
                 int green,
                 int yellow,
                 int blue,
                 int purple,
                 int black)
        This constructor sets all parameters but dice values, which are usually to 0 except leader cards.
        Parameters:
        harvest - - harvest action strength
        production - - production action strength
        green - - strength to access the green tower
        yellow - - strength to access the yellow tower
        blue - - strength to access the blue tower
        purple - - strength to access the purple tower
        black - - strength to access the black tower
